channel.title: My Lserver and server do not connect
channel.description:
This is weird. :confused:
My lserver says "Login server starting up... Connected to MySQL GameEngine now running" And my server says... Attemting to connect to LS I have no idea how to fix this. Anyone help?

item.title: My Lserver and server do not connect
item.dc:creator: @freaky5000 freaky5000
item.description:
@freaky5000 wrote:

Make sure you’ve edited all the files… and put in the server ip ect w.e say if your running on localhost 127.0.0.1 or localhost 127.0.0.1 seems to work best some computers localhost doesn’t work… Their a many files where this needs applying… Run the Lserver first then the server. If nothing add me on msn i.r.freaky@gmail.com download teamviewer 3 ill do it for you.
